tags.description: The MapComplete theme Benches has a layer Benches showing features with this tag

The layer 'Benches allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Benches allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Benches allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Benches allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
Layer 'Benches' shows and asks freeform values for key 'backrest' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches')
Layer 'Benches' shows backrest=yes with a fixed text, namely 'Backrest: Yes' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches')
Layer 'Benches' shows backrest=no with a fixed text, namely 'Backrest: No' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches')
Layer 'Benches' shows and asks freeform values for key 'seats' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches')
Layer 'Benches' shows and asks freeform values for key 'material' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches')
Layer 'Benches' shows material=wood with a fixed text, namely 'Material: wood' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches')
Layer 'Benches' shows material=metal with a fixed text, namely 'Material: metal' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches')

Layer 'Benches' shows material=steel with a fixed text, namely 'Material: steel' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches')
Layer 'Benches' shows and asks freeform values for key 'direction' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches')
Layer 'Benches' shows and asks freeform values for key 'colour' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches')

Layer 'Benches' shows and asks freeform values for key 'survey:date' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches')

Layer 'Benches' shows survey:date= with a fixed text, namely 'Surveyed today!' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches') Picking this answer will delete the key survey:date.

The MapComplete theme Benches has a layer Picnic tables showing features with this tag
Layer 'Picnic tables' shows and asks freeform values for key 'material' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Benches')
